description: Try our easy to follow Slow-Cooked Lemon & White Wine Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Lemon,Slow cooker,Low sugar,Chicken
name: SlowCooked Lemon & White Wine Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs baby capers in salt, rinsed
2 lemons (and some charred lemon wedges to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut chicken into 8 pieces and season. Heat the oil in a frying pan and cook chicken, turning frequently, for 5 minutes or until well browned. Transfer to a slow cooker or ovenproof casserole.
Finely shred the rind from the lemons. Using a small knife, remove the pith and divide flesh into segments. Add lemon segments, rind, leek, garlic and thyme to the slow cooker. Pour over the wine.
Set the slow cooker to HIGH and cook for 1 hour or until chicken is cooked through. Stir in capers. Serve with steamed green beans and charred lemon wedges.
